title: Ancillary Service Market Bidding
description: A battery storage asset operator needs to submit bids into the day-ahead market for ancillary services (frequency regulation).

tasks.description: Analyze historical clearing prices for frequency regulation services in the target market.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies price patterns, such as higher prices during morning and evening ramps.

tasks.description: Determine the battery's available capacity for regulation up/down, considering its current state of charge and any energy arbitrage commitments.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the MW capacity available for bidding in each hour.

tasks.description: Formulate and submit hourly bids into the ancillary service market based on price forecasts and opportunity cost.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits a set of competitive bids.
